panels.title: Ratio of Requests within Response Time

panels.description: Calculates the ratio between the requests within responste time and the overall amount of requests
panels.title: Individual SLOs

options.content: deploy/$deployment

targets.expr: sum(irate(route_response_total{classification="success", namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (rt_route) / sum(irate(route_response_total{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (rt_route)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(route_response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="outbound", rt_route!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, rt_route))

panels.description: Calculates the correlation coefficient between the requests within responste time and the overall amount of requests
panels.title: Correlation coefficient Requests Within Responste Time

targets.expr:
sum(rate(route_response_total{namespace="$namespace", direction="outbound", classification="success", deployment="loadgenerator"}[$__range])) by (rt_route)
/
sum(rate(route_response_total{namespace="$namespace", direction="outbound", deployment="loadgenerator"}[$__range])) by (rt_route)
histogram_quantile(0.01, sum(rate(route_response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="outbound", rt_route!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, rt_route))

sum(irate(route_response_total{classification="success", namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (rt_route) / sum(irate(route_response_total{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (rt_route)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(route_response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound", rt_route!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, rt_route))
histogram_quantile(0.01, sum(rate(route_response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", direction="inbound", rt_route!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, rt_route))

panels.description: Calculates the correlation coefficient between the requests within responste time and the overall amount of requests
panels.title: Correlation coefficient Requests Within Responste Time
Ratio of Requests within Response Time

options.content: deploy/$outbound

targets.expr: sum(irate(response_total{classification="success", namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", dst_deployment="$outbound", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (dst_deployment) / sum(irate(response_total{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", dst_deployment="$outbound", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (dst_deployment)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", dst_deployment="$outbound", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, dst_deployment))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", dst_deployment="$outbound", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, dst_deployment))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(response_latency_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$deployment", dst_deployment="$outbound", direction="outbound"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, dst_deployment))

list.description: The accepted response time for the call in the experiment
list.label: Accepted Response Time
list.name: accepted_response_time
